SEARCH
Package edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.controller

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.controller.CourseController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/courses") @CrossOrigin public class CourseController extends Object
This class is a REST controller for courses. Handles HTTP requests for the /courses endpoint.

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseController

      public CourseController(CourseService courseService, TeacherService teacherService, StudentService studentService)
      Create a new CourseController. Uses dependency injection to set the CourseService, TeacherService, and StudentService.
      Parameters:
      courseService - The service for Course entities.
      teacherService - The service for Teacher entities.
      studentService - The service for Student entities.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<CourseDTO>> getAll()
      Handle HTTP GET requests for the / endpoint. Returns list of all courses in response body
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing a list of all courses or a 204 status code if there are no courses

    • get

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> get(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP GET requests for the /{id} endpoint. Returns course with the given id in response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the course with the given id, or a 404 status code if it doesn't exist

    • getTeacher

      @GetMapping("/{id}/teacher") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TeacherDTO> getTeacher(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP GET requests for the /{id}/teacher endpoint. Returns teacher of the course with the given id in response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the teacher of the course with the given id, a 404 if the course doesn't exist, or a 204 status code if it doesn't have a teacher

    • getStudents

      @GetMapping("/{id}/students") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<StudentDTO>> getStudents(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP GET requests for the /{id}/students endpoint. Returns list of students of the course with the given id in response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the students of the course with the given id, a 404 if the course doesn't exist, or a 204 status code if it doesn't have students

    • create

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> create(@RequestBody CourseDTO course)
      Handle HTTP POST requests for the / endpoint. Creates a new course from the request body, and returns it in the response body
      Parameters:
      course - The course to create, given as a request body
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the created course, or a 400 status code if the course data is invalid

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> update(@RequestBody CourseDTO course, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP PUT requests for the /{id} endpoint. Updates a course by its id with the request body, and returns it in the response body
      Parameters:
      course - The new course data, given as a request body
      id - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the updated course, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist, or a 400 status code if the course data is invalid

    • patch

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> patch(@RequestBody CourseDTO course, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP PATCH requests for the /{id} endpoint. Patches a course by its id with the request body, and returns it in the response body
      Parameters:
      course - The new course data, given as a request body
      id - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the updated course, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist, or a 400 status code if the course data is invalid

    • updateTeacher

      @PutMapping("/{id}/teacher") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateTeacher(@RequestBody TeacherDTO teacher, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP PUT requests for the /{id}/teacher endpoint. Updates the teacher of a course by its id with the request body, and returns the updated course in the response body
      Parameters:
      teacher - The new teacher data, given as a request body
      id - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the updated course, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist

    • addStudents

      @PostMapping("/{id}/students") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> addStudents(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody List<StudentDTO> students)
      Handle HTTP POST requests for the /{id}/students endpoint. Adds students to a course by its id with the request body, and returns the updated course in the response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      students - The students to add, given as a request body, must contain at least either student ids or names
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the updated course, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist, or a 400 status code if the student data is invalid

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CourseDTO> delete(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP DELETE requests for the /{id} endpoint. Deletes a course by its id, and returns it in the response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to delete, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the deleted course, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist

    • removeTeacher

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/teacher") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> removeTeacher(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP DELETE requests for the /{id}/teacher endpoint. Removes the teacher from a course by its id, and returns the removed teacher in the response body
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the removed teacher, or a 404 status code if the course doesn't exist

    • removeStudent

      @DeleteMapping("/{courseId}/students/{studentId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> removeStudent(@PathVariable("courseId") Long courseId, @PathVariable("studentId") Long studentId)
      Handle HTTP DELETE requests for the /{courseId}/students/{studentId} endpoint. Removes a student from a course by their id, and returns the removed student in the response body
      Parameters:
      courseId - The id of the course to update, given as a path variable
      studentId - The id of the student to remove, given as a path variable
      Returns:
      An HTTP response containing the removed student, a 404 if the course doesn't exist, or a 400 status code if the student doesn't exist
